meanings.definition: Hajjes (noun): plural form of hajj, the pilgrimage to Mecca
meanings.sent1: During the hajjes, many Muslims travel to Mecca.
meanings.sent2: The hajjes are an important journey for followers of Islam.
meanings.sent3: The hajjes brought people from distant lands together.
meanings.sent4: The hajjes symbolize unity and devotion.
meanings.sent5: The hajjes left a lasting impact on the travelers.

meanings.definition: Hajjes (verb): third person singular present of hajj, to make the pilgrimage to Mecca
meanings.sent1: He hajjes to Mecca every year.
meanings.sent2: She hajjes with her family during the holy month.
meanings.sent3: The camel hajjes to the sacred city.
meanings.sent4: Their faith hajjes them towards the pilgrimage.
meanings.sent5: The call to hajjes resonates with many believers.
